ComicInfo.Title: [Untitled]; Car Wash
ComicInfo.Summary:
Gumball has been using the phrase, "I’ll owe you one!" to get free favors for a while now. When he finds out that it’s not just a saying and he actually owes everyone a favor, he’s going to have to pay up quick before catastrophe strikes!
*List of covers and their creators:* Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | ----------------------------------------------------------- Reg | Regular Cover | Missy Pena | 1 | Sub | Subscription Cover | Evan Palmer | 2 | Var | Variant Cover | Jemma Salume | 3 |
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-11-25 19:51:38. [CVDB476836]
ComicInfo.Penciller: Derek Sullivan, Paulina Ganucheau, Tyson Hesse
ComicInfo.Inker: Derek Sullivan, Paulina Ganucheau, Tyson Hesse
ComicInfo.CoverArtist: Evan Palmer, Jemma Salume, Missy Pena
ComicInfo.Characters: Banana Joe, Bomb Guy, Carrie Krueger, Darwin Watterson, Gaylord Robinson, Gumball Watterson, Larry Needlemeyer, Masami, Miss Simian, Mr. Small, Nicole Watterson, Penny Fitzgerald, Richard Watterson, Tina Rex
